lead_paragraph: After fleeing an explosion at the shopping center where he works, security guard Sam awakes to a nightmarish world where he is visited by victims of the tragedy. Sam is drawn into the narrative of their lives, revealing a harrowing glimpse of their sorrow. A young woman accosts him for not saving her infant son. A lonely man confides his unrequited love for a shopkeeper. A frustrated slacker pines for the woman who rejected him. A number of the victims even indict Sam's failure to protect them, but their accusations are a pale reflection of the guilt he feels for a traumatic incident in his own past.
